channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Othello
channel.desc: Othello and Desdemona defy prejudice to be united in marriage, but deadly malice lurks where the newlyweds least expect it; the man Othello trusts the most resolves to destroy their happiness at any cost.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Grand Designs Australia
channel.desc: Bel and John are building a radical underground house on 25 spectacular acres at Whittlesea, in Victoria's Plenty Valley.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: The Great British Baking Show
channel.desc: The new baking bubble abounds with bold Battenbergs, pineapple upside-down cakes and heroic cake busts.

channel.name: CBC Toronto CA
channel.title: Dragons' Den
channel.desc: A confectionary couple shares a taste of history; a young entrepreneur hopes her new app will get the Dragons jumping for joy; siblings have a product they hope the Dragons won't roll over on.
